metadata.title: insecure use of regular expressions leads to ReDoS (moderate)
metadata.description:
DOCUMENTATION: A vulnerability was found in the terser package. Affected versions of this package are vulnerable to Regular expression denial of service (ReDoS) attacks, affecting system availability. 
            STATEMENT: For OpenShift Do (odo) product terser is shipped only for using in static page generators for upstream, thus this represents no security risk.

criterions.comment: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 8 is installed
cockpit-ovirt is signed with Red Hat redhatrelease2 key
Red Hat Enterprise Linux must be installed
